sn7.16:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena paccanikasato nama brahmano savatthiyam pativasati.
sn7.16:1.5: Yam yadeva samano gotamo bhasissati tam tadevassaham paccanikassan”ti.
sn7.16:1.6: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava abbhokase cankamati.
sn7.16:1.7: Atha kho paccanikasato brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam cankamantam etadavoca:
sn7.16:4.1: Evam vutte, paccanikasato brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.16:4.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
